channel.title: Destortion - 24/7 DDoS Protected VPS - 508 Maps - Bounty hunter - Economy
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/logo2_zps5d1ec2fd.gif[/img]
Hi,
I have currently worked on this project for a while, and It's my time to contribute it to the players who want to play a server.. I did not make this server for any money purpose and I just made this for the purpose of [B]Enjoying.[/B] Most owners nowadays are just money greedy - but in this server, we offer something different. Our server contain's mature staff that is just like our players and we also like to chill, have fun & share with our players. We've spent endless amount of hours trying to build up what we have today even though we have a very basic knowledge of java & other programming languages.
~Mohd - Owner/Developer
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"]This is not a Pk'ing server - it's economy[/COLOR][/B]
Let's start with the content:
Forums/Webclient = [url=http://destortion.com]Destortion[/url]
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/Screenshot_1-6_zpsefd6260e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/Screenshot_3-4_zps9704d956.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/Screenshot_4-2_zps2977356a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/Screenshot_5_zpsd158e571.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
Please register on forums & comment what do you want to be added.
